message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500.  I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you consider that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your offer, but I can't go below $11,000 for this product. It's truly valuable and I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable paying $11,000. Can you meet me in the middle at $10,750? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
